page.title: 19ATTITUDES
page.content: ABOUT 60% OF THE POPULATION IS OVER RETIREMENT AGE. MANY OF THEM ONLY MOVED HERE ON RETIREMENT, AND AGREE THAT IT IS A QUIET, PEACEFUL, PLEASANT AREA. HOWEVER, MOST PEOPLE WOULD LIKE MORE FACILITIES FOR BOTH YOUNG AND OLD. THER ARE THREE AREAS OVER WHICH THERE IS EXTENSIVE DISAGREEMENT: THAT THE CRIME RATE IS HIGH OR LOW; THAT THE LOCAL SHOPS ARE ADEQUATE OR NOT; AND THAT THE LOCAL TRANSPORT IS OR IS NOT ADEQUATE. LOCAL CRIME IS MOSTLY BURGLARY. OVER THE LAST 20 YEARS MANY NEW HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT. THE PEOPLE HERE HAVE ELECTED CONSERVATIVE REPRESENTATIVES FOR BOTH LOCAL AND NATIONAL GOVERNMENT. THE BIGGEST IMPROVEMENT EVERYONE WOULD LIKE TO SEE IS AN AVAILABLE SWIMMING POOL; THE NEAREST ONE IS 6 MILES AWAY IN HASTINGS.
